statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // .cwd'); git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useReplaceRefs=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name // "normal"'); thinking=$(echo "$input" | jq -r 'if .alwaysThinkingEnabled == true or (.model.id | contains("opus")) then "thinking" else "standard" end // "unknown"'); printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[33m[\033[0m\033[32m%s\033[0m\033[33m]\033[0m \033[35m%s\033[0m \033[90m(%s)\033[0m" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_branch" "$output_style" "$thinking"
